abstract: Steve Chen, YouTube’s founder, left the online video site to work at parent company Google.
snippet: Steve Chen, YouTube’s founder, left the online video site to work at parent company Google.
lead_paragraph: YouTube confirmed on Tuesday that Steve Chen, a co-founder and most recently YouTube’s chief technology officer, was no longer working at the company. Mr. Chen left some time ago to work on unspecified engineering projects at its parent, Google.
